xfy.fakeview.library.fview

类 FView

  • java.lang.Object
    • xfy.fakeview.library.fview.FView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, IFView, IView
    直接已知子类:
    FImageView, FTextView, FViewGroup

    public class FView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFView, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/7. 基础View 可通过setDebug(boolean)打开debug开关 FView只有一种构造方法，传入Context和IFViewRoot

      • onAttachedToWindow

        public void onAttachedToWindow()
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        This is called when the view is attached to a window. At this point it has a Surface and will start drawing. Note that this function is guaranteed to be called before IFView.draw(Canvas), however it may be called any time before the first onDraw -- including before or after IFView.measure(int, int).
        指定者:
        onAttachedToWindow 在接口中 IFView
        另请参阅:
        IFView.onDetachedFromWindow()

      • measure

        public final void measure(int widthMeasureSpec,
                          int heightMeasureSpec)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView

        This is called to find out how big a view should be. The parent supplies constraint information in the width and height parameters.

        The actual measurement work of a view is performed in onMeasure(int, int), called by this method. Therefore, only onMeasure(int, int) can and must be overridden by subclasses.

        指定者:
        measure 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        widthMeasureSpec - Horizontal space requirements as imposed by the parent
        heightMeasureSpec - Vertical space requirements as imposed by the parent
        另请参阅:
        onMeasure(int, int)

      • onMeasure

        protected void onMeasure(int widthMeasureSpec,
                         int heightMeasureSpec)

        Measure the view and its content to determine the measured width and the measured height. This method is invoked by measure(int, int) and should be overridden by subclasses to provide accurate and efficient measurement of their contents.

        CONTRACT: When overriding this method, you must call setMeasuredDimension(int, int) to store the measured width and height of this view. Failure to do so will trigger an IllegalStateException, thrown by measure(int, int). Calling the superclass' onMeasure(int, int) is a valid use.

        The base class implementation of measure defaults to the background size, unless a larger size is allowed by the MeasureSpec. Subclasses should override onMeasure(int, int) to provide better measurements of their content.

        If this method is overridden, it is the subclass's responsibility to make sure the measured height and width are at least the view's minimum height and width (getSuggestedMinimumHeight() and getSuggestedMinimumWidth()).

        参数:
        widthMeasureSpec - horizontal space requirements as imposed by the parent. The requirements are encoded with FMeasureSpec.
        heightMeasureSpec - vertical space requirements as imposed by the parent. The requirements are encoded with FMeasureSpec.
        另请参阅:
        getMeasuredWidth(), getMeasuredHeight(), setMeasuredDimension(int, int), getSuggestedMinimumHeight(), getSuggestedMinimumWidth(), FMeasureSpec.getMode(int), FMeasureSpec.getSize(int)

      • setMeasuredDimension

        protected final void setMeasuredDimension(int measuredWidth,
                                          int measuredHeight)

        This method must be called by onMeasure(int, int) to store the measured width and measured height. Failing to do so will trigger an exception at measurement time.

        参数:
        measuredWidth - The measured width of this view.
        measuredHeight - The measured height of this view.

      • getMeasuredState

        public final int getMeasuredState()
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Return only the state bits of IFView.getMeasuredWidth() and IFView.getMeasuredHeight(), combined into one integer. The width component is in the regular bits IFView.MEASURED_STATE_MASK and the height component is at the shifted bits IFView.MEASURED_HEIGHT_STATE_SHIFT>>IFView.MEASURED_STATE_MASK.
        指定者:
        getMeasuredState 在接口中 IFView

      • layout

        public void layout(int l,
                   int t,
                   int r,
                   int b)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Assign a size and position to a view and all of its descendants

        This is the second phase of the layout mechanism. (The first is measuring). In this phase, each parent calls layout on all of its children to position them. This is typically done using the child measurements that were stored in the measure pass().

        Derived classes should not override this method. Derived classes with children should override onLayout. In that method, they should call layout on each of their children.

        指定者:
        layout 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

      • isLayout

        protected boolean isLayout()
        check whether this view has bean layouted
        返回:
        true: layout, false otherwise

      • setFrame

        protected void setFrame(int l,
                        int t,
                        int r,
                        int b)
        Assign a size and position to this view. This is called from layout.
        参数:
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

      • onLayout

        public void onLayout(boolean changed,
                     int l,
                     int t,
                     int r,
                     int b)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Called from layout when this view should assign a size and position to each of its children. Derived classes with children should override this method and call layout on each of their children.
        指定者:
        onLayout 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        changed - This is a new size or position for this view
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Manually render this view (and all of its children) to the given Canvas. The view must have already done a full layout before this function is called. When implementing a view, implement onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) instead of overriding this method. If you do need to override this method, call the superclass version.
        指定者:
        draw 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        canvas - The Canvas to which the View is rendered.

      • dispatchDraw

        protected void dispatchDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Called by draw to draw the child views. This may be overridden by derived classes to gain control just before its children are drawn (but after its own view has been drawn).
        参数:
        canvas - the canvas on which to draw the view

      • findFViewById

        public FView findFViewById(int id)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Finds the first descendant view with the given ID, the view itself if the ID matches IView.getId(), or null if the ID is invalid (< 0) or there is no matching view in the hierarchy.

        Note: In most cases -- depending on compiler support -- the resulting view is automatically cast to the target class type. If the target class type is unconstrained, an explicit cast may be necessary.

        指定者:
        findFViewById 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        id - the ID to search for
        返回:
        a view with given ID if found, or null otherwise

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate()
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Invalidate the whole view. If the view is visible, IFView.draw(Canvas) will be called at some point in the future.

        This must be called from a UI thread. To call from a non-UI thread, call

        指定者:
        invalidate 在接口中 IFView

      • invalidate

        protected void invalidate(android.graphics.Rect dirty)
        Mark the area defined by dirty as needing to be drawn. If the view is visible, draw(Canvas) will be called at some point in the future.

        This must be called from a UI thread.

        WARNING: In API 19 and below, this method may be destructive to dirty.

        参数:
        dirty - the rectangle representing the bounds of the dirty region

      • getFLayoutParams

        public IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams getFLayoutParams()
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Get the LayoutParams associated with this view. All views should have layout parameters. These supply parameters to the parent of this view specifying how it should be arranged. There are many subclasses of ViewGroup.LayoutParams, and these correspond to the different subclasses of ViewGroup that are responsible for arranging their children. This method may return null if this View is not attached to a parent ViewGroup or IFView.setFLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams) was not invoked successfully. When a View is attached to a parent ViewGroup, this method must not return null.
        指定者:
        getFLayoutParams 在接口中 IFView
        返回:
        The LayoutParams associated with this view, or null if no parameters have been set yet

      • setFLayoutParams

        public void setFLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Set the layout parameters associated with this view. These supply parameters to the parent of this view specifying how it should be arranged. There are many subclasses of ViewGroup.LayoutParams, and these correspond to the different subclasses of ViewGroup that are responsible for arranging their children.
        指定者:
        setFLayoutParams 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        params - The layout parameters for this view, cannot be null

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable background)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Set the background to a given Drawable, or remove the background. If the background has padding, this View's padding is set to the background's padding. However, when a background is removed, this View's padding isn't touched. If setting the padding is desired, please use IFView.setPadding(int, int, int, int).
        指定者:
        setBackground 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        background - The Drawable to use as the background, or null to remove the background

      • post

        public boolean post(java.lang.Runnable action)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView

        Causes the Runnable to be added to the message queue. The runnable will be run on the user interface thread.

        指定者:
        post 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        action - The Runnable that will be executed.
        返回:
        Returns true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.
        另请参阅:
        IFView.postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable, long), IFView.removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable)

      • postDelayed

        public boolean postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable action,
                           long delayMillis)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView

        Causes the Runnable to be added to the message queue, to be run after the specified amount of time elapses. The runnable will be run on the user interface thread.

        指定者:
        postDelayed 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        action - The Runnable that will be executed.
        delayMillis - The delay (in milliseconds) until the Runnable will be executed.
        返回:
        true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting. Note that a result of true does not mean the Runnable will be processed -- if the looper is quit before the delivery time of the message occurs then the message will be dropped.
        另请参阅:
        IFView.post(java.lang.Runnable), IFView.removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable)

      • removeCallbacks

        public boolean removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable action)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView

        Removes the specified Runnable from the message queue.

        指定者:
        removeCallbacks 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        action - The Runnable to remove from the message handling queue
        返回:
        true if this view could ask the Handler to remove the Runnable, false otherwise. When the returned value is true, the Runnable may or may not have been actually removed from the message queue (for instance, if the Runnable was not in the queue already.)
        另请参阅:
        IFView.post(java.lang.Runnable), IFView.postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable, long)

        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        请求布局整个view树

        requestLayoutAll 在接口中 IFView

        Return the full width measurement information for this view as computed by the most recent call to IFView.measure(int, int). This should be used during measurement and layout calculations only. Use IFView.getWidth() to see how wide a view is after layout.

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(int l,
                       int t,
                       int r,
                       int b)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Sets the padding. The view may add on the space required to display the scrollbars, depending on the style and visibility of the scrollbars. So the values returned from IFView.getPaddingLeft(), IFView.getPaddingTop(), IFView.getPaddingRight() and IFView.getPaddingBottom() may be different from the values set in this call.
        指定者:
        setPadding 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        l - the left padding in pixels
        t - the top padding in pixels
        r - the right padding in pixels
        b - the bottom padding in pixels

      • dispatchTouchEvent

        指定者:
        dispatchTouchEvent 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        event - The motion event to be dispatched.
        返回:
        True if the event was handled by the view, false otherwise.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Implement this method to handle touch screen motion events.

        If this method is used to detect click actions, it is recommended that the actions be performed by implementing and calling performClick(). This will ensure consistent system behavior, including:

        • dispatching OnClickListener calls
        指定者:
        onTouchEvent 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        event - The motion event.
        返回:
        True if the event was handled, false otherwise.

      • setPressed

        protected void setPressed(boolean pressed)
        Sets the pressed state for this view.
        参数:
        pressed - Pass true to set the View's internal state to "pressed", or false to reverts the View's internal state from a previously set "pressed" state.
        另请参阅:
        isClickable(), setClickable(boolean)

      • isPressed

        protected boolean isPressed()
        Indicates whether the view is currently in pressed state. Unless setPressed(boolean) is explicitly called, only clickable views can enter the pressed state.
        返回:
        true if the view is currently pressed, false otherwise
        另请参阅:
        setPressed(boolean), isClickable(), setClickable(boolean)

      • setClickable

        public void setClickable(boolean clickable)
        Enables or disables click events for this view. When a view is clickable it will change its state to "pressed" on every click. Subclasses should set the view clickable to visually react to user's clicks.
        参数:
        clickable - true to make the view clickable, false otherwise
        另请参阅:
        isClickable()

      • setOnClickListener

        public void setOnClickListener(IFView.OnClickListener listener)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView
        Register a callback to be invoked when this view is clicked. If this view is not clickable, it becomes clickable.
        指定者:
        setOnClickListener 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        listener - The callback that will run
        另请参阅:
        setClickable(boolean)

      • setLongClickable

        public void setLongClickable(boolean clickable)
        Enables or disables long click events for this view. When a view is long clickable it reacts to the user holding down the button for a longer duration than a tap. This event can either launch the listener or a context menu.
        参数:
        clickable - true to make the view long clickable, false otherwise

      • setOnLongClickListener

        public void setOnLongClickListener(IFView.OnLongClickListener listener)
        从接口复制的说明: IFView

        指定者:
        setOnLongClickListener 在接口中 IFView
        参数:
        listener - The callback that will run
        另请参阅:
        setLongClickable(boolean)

      • performClick

        public boolean performClick()
        Call this view's OnClickListener, if it is defined. Performs all normal actions associated with clicking: reporting accessibility event, playing a sound, etc.
        返回:
        True there was an assigned OnClickListener that was called, false otherwise is returned.

      • performLongClick

        public boolean performLongClick()
        Calls this view's OnLongClickListener, if it is defined. Invokes the context menu if the OnLongClickListener did not consume the event.
        返回:
        true if one of the above receivers consumed the event, false otherwise

      • getSuggestedMinimumHeight

        protected int getSuggestedMinimumHeight()
        Returns the suggested minimum height that the view should use. This returns the maximum of the view's minimum height and the background's minimum height (Drawable.getMinimumHeight()).

        When being used in onMeasure(int, int), the caller should still ensure the returned height is within the requirements of the parent.

        返回:
        The suggested minimum height of the view.

      • getSuggestedMinimumWidth

        protected int getSuggestedMinimumWidth()
        Returns the suggested minimum width that the view should use. This returns the maximum of the view's minimum width and the background's minimum width (Drawable.getMinimumWidth()).

        When being used in onMeasure(int, int), the caller should still ensure the returned width is within the requirements of the parent.

        返回:
        The suggested minimum width of the view.
